name: Reditus
tagline: Reditus has skills in Information Technology (IT),
description:
Reditus has skills in Information Technology (IT), Outsourcing, Client Services, Infrastructures, and IT Consulting.
Since 1966, when it was founded, it has developed high levels of specialization and execution capacity in various sectors of activity, having expanded its activity all over the world.
Today it provides solutions that combine expertise, knowledge and the most advanced technology in custom development solutions, business process management and Business Analytics, developed in partnership with world leaders in their segments and offerings.
Being aware of the needs of the market, Reditus regularly promotes consultant training academies, specializing in the most advanced technologies, responding to a growing market demand for innovative and reliable solutions.
